details: Identified 2nd degree connection via John Smith (former CTO at TechCorp) to Sarah Chen at Accel Partners
Drafted warm introduction email highlighting portfolio fit and mutual connections. Awaiting approval.
Reviewed and approved the introduction email to Sarah Chen. Ready for outreach.
Warm introduction email sent to Sarah Chen via John Smith. Email includes company deck and key metrics.
Sarah Chen responded with interest. Mentioned availability for a call next week. Proceeding to schedule.
Analyzing both calendars to find optimal meeting time. Found 3 potential slots next Tuesday-Wednesday.
Sent personalized cold email highlighting portfolio synergies and recent Series A metrics.
No response received. Follow-up email scheduled for tomorrow with additional context about market opportunity.
